QuestData.Title: Smoot's Samophlange
QuestData.Description: It was the Captain who insisted his new engines use an induction samophlange.$B$BThose things hadn't even been invented yet!$B$BI tasked Smoot with creating one based on some stolen Venture Company schematics, and he's finally built a working model.$B$BNow that he's got his samophlange, he's drunk with power. He's running all over town with it like a goblin possessed.$B$BSmack Smoot and snag my samophlange, $n.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Find Smoot somewhere in Bilgewater Harbor!
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Smoot somewhere in Bilgewater Harbor. Tackle him and get the Induction Samophlange.
QuestData.CompletionText: Smoot's a good engineer.$B$BA samophlange can kill from thirty yards if you misalign the reduction caliphracts.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! I should have this here engine samophlanginated within the hour.
